title: New: Boycott – Operate Feat. Akacia
body:
This is super smooth.

Breathy, graceful vocals and some effortlessly glossy production combine on _Operate_, the newest track from London producer **Boycott**, featuring Melbourne’s **Akacia** on vocals. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
